S

save(Context) - Static method in class vikram.connect.com.connect.Data
Writes data to local files in .json format
SelectActivity - Class in vikram.connect.com.connect
Activity is first screen user sees on opening the app Activity is basically a RecyclerView with button on bottom RecyclerView is inflated with data user has stored on his/her phone
SelectAdapter - Class in vikram.connect.com.connect
Class is the custom adapter for RecyclerView present on the very first screen (selection screen) Will inflate CardViews inside recycler view to match passed in data CardView design is specified in select_cv.xml
SelectAdapter(ArrayList<String[]>, AppCompatActivity, RecyclerView) - Constructor for class vikram.connect.com.connect.SelectAdapter
Constructor to pass in data which will be utilized for filling RecyclerView
SelectAdapter.SelViewHolder - Class in vikram.connect.com.connect
Internal static class which inflates the CardView specific to this recycler view finds elements and inflates them when passed in input.
SelectClickListener - Class in vikram.connect.com.connect
Responds to a CardView being clicked on the SelectActivity page This class ensures that the following activity which is opened has the necessary data to proceed.
SelectClickListener(RecyclerView, ArrayList<String[]>, AppCompatActivity) - Constructor for class vikram.connect.com.connect.SelectClickListener
Constructor to create listener
SelViewHolder(View) - Constructor for class vikram.connect.com.connect.SelectAdapter.SelViewHolder
Constructor for CardView, finds the necessary elements to inflate
setupDrawer() - Method in class vikram.connect.com.connect.MainActivity
Code creates the navigation drawer in the right spot for the application
setupDrawer() - Method in class vikram.connect.com.connect.SelectActivity
Configure navigation drawer for app
speak(View) - Method in class vikram.connect.com.connect.MainActivity
Called when user wants his text to be spoken out loud Will use tts to 'speak' the words
startVoiceRecognitionActivity() - Method in class vikram.connect.com.connect.MainActivity
Method which creates the intent for voice recognition and begins it
